messages.content: I live in california, can I get an abortion there?

Yes, you can obtain an abortion in California. Here are the relevant policies: 1. **Waiting Periods**: There are no mandatory waiting periods for obtaining an abortion in California. 2. **Insurance Coverage**: - Insurance plans on the state exchange have no restrictions on abortion coverage. - Medicaid covers abortions based on the provider and patient decision. - California requires insurance coverage for abortion services. 3. **Gestational Limits**: - Abortion is generally allowed up to 99 weeks since the last menstrual period (LMP), effectively with no gestational limit. - Exceptions are made for the life and health of the pregnant person, with health exceptions being broad ("Any"). 4. **Minors**: - Minors are allowed to consent to an abortion without parental involvement. These policies indicate that California provides broad access to abortion services.
